song.title: No Kelvin
song.info:
2nd place in combined demo compo at The Gathering 2005
Lyrics: I'm still haunted in my dreams Waking up with awful screams Feel so lost and lone at night
I have tried to understand The things you used to do to me You should just have let me be
There is pain inside of me Worse than you could ever see That is all because of you
What I try to understand Is why you chose to take my hand And lead me into misery
What you did, you did to hurt Treating me like so much dirt Was it all for play or show?
Took away my long for love And I've come to see my fate It is all filled up with hate
There is pain inside of me Worse than you could ever see That is all because of you
What I try to understand Is why you chose to take my hand And lead me into misery
I have these scars from breaking free Scars that only I can see Some of the things that I should do Remove all memory of you
You keep hurting, You keep hurting, You keep hurting me
You keep hurting, You keep hurting, You keep hurting me
